Filia Regis._current: 1 Dragon Fusion Monster + 1 Level 7 or higher Dragon monster ① MAIN PHASE | HOPT | QUICK | You can target 1 card your opponent controls or in their GY; BANISH it, then if you banished a card on the field, BOUNCE 1 Dragon monster you control. ② HOPT | At the start of your opponent's Battle Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can BOUNCE 1 Dragon monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon this card.
Filia Regis.previous: 1 Dragon Fusion Monster + 1 Level 7 or higher Dragon monster ① MAIN PHASE | HOPT | QUICK | You can target 1 card your opponent controls or in their GY; BANISH it, then if you banished a card on the field, BOUNCE 1 Dragon monster you control. ② HOPT | At the start of your opponent's Battle Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can BOUNCE 1 Dragon monster you control or Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card.

Ritual Beast Ulti-Reirautari._current: 3+ Effect Monsters Neither player can Tribute cards to activate a card or effect. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ritual Beast Ulti-Reirautari" once per turn. You can target 1 of your banished "Ritual Beast" cards; BOUNCE it, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 "Ritual Beast" monster from your hand. During your opponent's turn (QUICK EFFECT): You can target 1 "Ritual Beast" card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; BANISH them.

During your opponent's turn (QUICK EFFECT): You can target 1 "Ritual Beast" card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; BANISH them.
